alert.note: Alert for Inland Onslow; Jones (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jones and northwestern Onslow Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Half Moon. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Half Moon, Pumpkin Center, Piney Green, Richlands, Kellum, Richlands South and Deppe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
